alert.note: Alert for South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 2:41AM PST until December 02 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of eight to sixteen inches above 7,000 feet. Snow amounts of four to eight inches from 5,000 feet to 7,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South End of the Upper Sierra. * WHEN...Valid from 10 AM PST this morning until 4 AM PST Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Expect snow covered roads and low visibilities. Plan on travel delays. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow is possible this weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South End of the Upper Sierra
